SELECT b.icon as icon FROM pf_user_sku a INNER JOIN pf_sku_agent b ON a.sku_id = b.sku_id AND a.agent_level_id = b.agent_level_id INNER JOIN com_sku c ON b.sku_id = c.id INNER JOIN com_spu d ON c.spu_id = d.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and d.type = 0;

SELECT a.id, a.sku_id, a.agent_level_id, a.icon, a.unit_price, a.quantity, a.total_price, a.bail, a.back_img, a.is_show, a.reward_unit_price, b.name AS remark FROM pf_sku_agent a INNER JOIN com_agent_level b ON a.agent_level_id = b.id INNER JOIN com_sku c ON a.sku_id = c.id INNER JOIN com_spu d on c.spu_id = d.id WHERE a.sku_id = #{skuId} AND agent_level_id < #{agentLevelId} AND agent_level_id >= #{pLevelId} AND a.is_upgrade = 1 AND d.type = 0;

SELECT a.agent_level_id as agentLevel, b.name as agentName, a.unit_price as unitPrice, a.quantity as quantity, a.total_price as totalPrice, a.bail as bailAmount, b.is_organization as isOrganization, b.organization_suffix as organizationSuffix, c.price_retail as priceRetail FROM pf_sku_agent a INNER JOIN com_agent_level b ON a.agent_level_id = b.id INNER JOIN com_sku c ON a.sku_id = c.id INNER JOIN com_spu d on c.spu_id = d.id WHERE a.sku_id = #{skuId} AND agent_level_id < #{agentLevelId} AND agent_level_id >= #{pLevelId} AND a.is_upgrade = 1 AND d.type = 0;
